entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
